kpi.name: M8000C38

kpi_info.title: Number of attempted X2 IP address retrievals via S1
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of attempts initiated by eNB to retrieve the X2 IP address of a neighbor eNB via S1. UPDATED: Transmission of S1AP:ENB CONFIGURATION TRANSFER including 'SON Information Request' for 'X2 TNL Configuration Info'.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of attempted X2 IP address retrievals via S1
